|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c0)), wss(cfv(clocfin, c2), cfv(clocfin, c0)))

comment: A locally finite cover in a coarser topology is locally finite in a finer topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
